body_html:
Thanks Kai, code looks good! Can you also add some entries to new_module_tests as done here: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_nn.py#L3083

Could also add checks that the functional layer_norm raises an error with size mismatches as done here https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_nn.py#L2287
body_text:
Thanks Kai, code looks good! Can you also add some entries to new_module_tests as done here: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_nn.py#L3083
Could also add checks that the functional layer_norm raises an error with size mismatches as done here https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_nn.py#L2287
body:
Thanks Kai, code looks good! Can you also add some entries to `new_module_tests` as done here: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_nn.py#L3083 

Could also add checks that the functional `layer_norm` raises an error with size mismatches as done here https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_nn.py#L2287
